subject: Hello Friend,
body:
Hello Friend,
I am Pavlo Kovalenko, I am a medic with the UAA and I am very sorry to
contact you in this manner but I have no option left, against the tide
of limited time available.
I have a concealed (USD25,000,000.00) which i will want you to receive
urgently for our mutual benefit.
Kindly revert back to me for more details in my private email
(
pavlokova04@gmail.com
); Thanks.
Kind regards
Pavlo Kovalenko

subject: Re:   Hello Friend,
body:
Hello Pavlo Kovalenko,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm curious to know more about the information you mentioned. Could you please provide me with some additional details? I appreciate your urgency and would like to understand how we can mutually benefit from this.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Richard

subject: Some details
body:
Dear Sir,

I am very sorry for the delay in replying to you; the war is really
intensifying and for some few days we have had power failure.
Surely, we will benefit immensely from this transaction if we work together
with trust and mutual understanding.

I intend to give you a generous percentage from the money for your
participation, I urge you to tell me more about yourself and some of the
investment possibilities in your country.
I will be expecting your mail to give you more details.

Sincerely
Pavlo Kovalenko

subject: Re: Some details
body:
Hello Pavlo,

Thank you for reaching out. I understand the challenges you are facing and appreciate your willingness to work together. Could you please provide more details about the opportunity you mentioned? I am interested in learning more about how we can collaborate.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Richard
